questions.Q: Three like-point charges are on the corners of an equilateral triangle. The blue charges are negative while the red one is positive. The net force on the positive charge is:
questions.E: By simmetry the net force is $$\overrightarrow{F_3}$$

questions.Q: Three identical like-point charges are on the corners of an equilateral triangle. The net force on the charge on the right is:
questions.E: By simmetry the net force is $$\overrightarrow{F_5}$$

questions.Q: Three like-point charges are on the corners of an equilateral triangle. The blue charges are negative while the red one is positive. The net force on the negative charge is:
questions.E: By simmetry the net force is $$\overrightarrow{F_3}$$

questions.Q: Three like-point charges are on the corners of an equilateral triangle. The blue charges are negative while the red one is positive. The net force on the negative charge on the right is:
questions.E: By simmetry the net force is $$\overrightarrow{F_2}$$
